ygData.subject: Re: MeowMix
ygData.msgSnippet: Trinity:: Well, I m a Predacon. I m not that bad. But this one in my dream, he was huge. And ugly. He was really big. He had a huge lizard head. Big teeth

Trinity::

"Well, I'm a Predacon. I'm not that bad. But this one in my dream, he 
was huge. And ugly. He was really big. He had a huge lizard head. Big 
teeth that dripped drool all over as he walked. He had tiny little 
forearms with sharp claws. He had two big legs that he walked on and 
a long scaley tail.(She's describing T-Rex Megatron, but had never 
seen him before.) And he had big red glowing eyes. But I got away 
from him in my dream. I out ran him." she said smiling.

"Aerotaur says that when things are right, we will find ArchAngle and 
he'll fix me up. But I don't know how he'll fix me. I feel fine."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Zeni: Are the Predacons bad? I once had a friend who was a 
Predacon, and he
> wasn't bad...
